locations: Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India::(All around the city)
imdb.plot outline: Rohan had some superpowers since childhood but he didn't use them. 3 years ago, he killed someone. Since then he decided to live a solitary life but he was forced to use them when Meera, his love interest was in trouble. What happens next is the impulsive reactions of a few youngsters and the arrival of a mysterious man, who is somehow connected to Rohan's past. On the other hand, Rohan and Meera are struggling to find out why is he cursed with these powers. All of this is followed by a trail of murders in the city within one day.
imdb.title: Radioactive
plot: Rohan gains some superpowers unknowingly but is scared to use them. What happens when he is forced to use them? What next and what is there behind?::Mohit Bose

Rohan had some superpowers since childhood but he didn't use them. 3 years ago, he killed someone. Since then he decided to live a solitary life but he was forced to use them when Meera, his love interest was in trouble. What happens next is the impulsive reactions of a few youngsters and the arrival of a mysterious man, who is somehow connected to Rohan's past. On the other hand, Rohan and Meera are struggling to find out why is he cursed with these powers. All of this is followed by a trail of murders in the city within one day.::Mohit Bose
